mention.text: Michael Robert Milken , the center of the nation 's biggest securities fraud investigation ever the compensation due for Michael Robert Milken , the center of the nation 's biggest securities fraud investigation
Michael Robert Milken , the center of the nation 's biggest securities
Dep Corp. , a Rancho Dominguez-based manufacturer of cosmetics and other personal-care products
chairman and president of Dep Corp. , a Rancho Dominguez-based manufacturer of cosmetics and other personal-care products `` Robert Berglass
chairman and president of Dep Corp. , a Rancho Dominguez-based manufacturer of cosmetics and other personal-care products
Eli Broad , chairman and chief executive of Kaufman & Broad , a Los Angeles home builder and occasional Drexel client
Eli Broad , chairman and chief executive of Kaufman & Broad , a Los Angeles home builder and occasional Drexel client
Kaufman & Broad , a Los Angeles home builder and occasional Drexel client
Kaufman & Broad , a Los Angeles home builder and occasional Drexel client

Companies ranging from MCI to Metromedia , from Holiday Inns to Levitz Furniture , used Drexel-underwritten bonds to finance growth or takeovers `` Mike 's a builder ; everything a builder ; everything 's touched
